channel.title: CVE Feed for Post Grid Team by WPXPO -- PostX – Gutenberg Blocks for Post Grid

item.title: CVE-2024-32564|2024-06-07T20:33:42.111Z -- post%20grid%20team%20by%20wpxpo -- postx%20%E2%80%93%20gutenberg%20blocks%20for%20post%20grid
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Post Grid Team by WPXPO PostX – Gutenberg Blocks for Post Grid allows Stored XSS.This issue affects PostX – Gutenberg Blocks for Post Grid: from n/a through 4.0.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-31246|2024-06-09T08:55:52.278Z -- post%20grid%20team%20by%20wpxpo -- postx%20%E2%80%93%20gutenberg%20blocks%20for%20post%20grid
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Post Grid Team by WPXPO PostX – Gutenberg Blocks for Post Grid.This issue affects PostX – Gutenberg Blocks for Post Grid: from n/a through 3.2.3.
